fb-interface.body-text: The schema alignment skeleton below specifies how your grid-shaped data will be transformed into graph-shaped data in Freebase's schemas.

fb-dialogs.add-info-source: Click here to add a new information source
fb-dialogs.warning-aligned: Have you aligned it with Freebase's schemas yet?
fb-dialogs.bodytext-1: Note: Your data will only be loaded into
fb-dialogs.bodytext-2: Sandbox is where everyone can experiment with Freebase technologies without disruption to the official
fb-dialogs.bodytext-4: In order to load your data into the official Freebase, you must first load it into Sandbox. Then it must pass a Quality Assurance (QA) process before it can be loaded into Freebase proper.
fb-dialogs.bodytext-5: After loaded into Sandbox, enlist other people's help to double-check this data load's quality so that it can be loaded into Freebase.
fb-dialogs.follow-progress: Follow the loading progress in the

fb-qa.bodytext-1: Other people will be enlisted to help double-check your data load for quality assurance purposes. Their time and labor have a cost.
fb-qa.bodytext-2: You yourself should have taken all reasonable measures to eliminate errors from your data load. Your prudence is greatly appreciated.

fb-extend.warning-valid-json: Please ensure that the JSON you enter is valid.
fb-extend.warning-json-obj: The JSON you enter must be an object, that is, it is of this form { ... }.
